summary: This is an email correspondence from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York regarding sharing documents about Maxwell via USAfx and requesting a phone discussion. The document appears to be part of legal proceedings or evidence sharing related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email who is sharing documents about Maxwell via USAfx and requesting a phone discussion.

events.title: Document Sharing Regarding Maxwell
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney shares documents about Maxwell via USAfx and requests a phone discussion.

locations.name: United States Attorney's Office Southern District of New York
locations.address: One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007

keyFacts: An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York is involved in sharing documents related to Maxwell.
The communication occurred on November 8, 2021, indicating ongoing legal activity related to the Epstein/Maxwell case at that time.
Documents were shared via USAfx, a secure file sharing system used by U.S. government agencies.
The email is marked as external, suggesting communication between different organizations or with parties outside the DOJ.
